thread.title: Jo Kwon Becomes First Male Celebrity To Complete A Beauty Specific Pictorial | Soompi
thread.title_full: Jo Kwon Becomes First Male Celebrity To Complete A Beauty Specific Pictorial | Soompi

author: C. Oh
title: Jo Kwon Becomes First Male Celebrity To Complete A Beauty Specific Pictorial | Soompi
text:
Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Singer Jo Kwon recently modeled makeup in a beauty photo shoot for Allure. 
The beauty pictorial is centered on makeup for men and Jo Kwon’s clean skin tone allows him to successfully pull off a variety of makeup looks for the shoot. In the interview that accompanies the pictorial, Jo Kwon reveals how he maintains his beautiful skin and confesses that he uses a mask pack every day. 
The full pictorial and interview will be available in Allure’s March issue.
